casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffery Martaez SIMPKINS 188A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 21, 2019

Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, For Simpkins, Jeffery Martaez Leroy.

Daniel O'Brien, Alexandra M. Hightower, Assistant Attorneys General, T. Lynn Clodfelter, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of May 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of May 2019."
